feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.3
entry.content:
🆕 Collect submitter timezone 🐞 Fix MySQL migration bug

Pro

🆕 Add one-off submission PDF and HTML API: https://www.docuseal.com/docs/api#create-a-submission-from-pdf https://www.docuseal.com/docs/api#create-a-submission-from-html

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.4
entry.content:
This update is recommended for all users.

🐞 PDF image preview generation fix. 🛠 Efficient search with inverted index. After updating visit /settings/account and click "Build Search Index" to enable this feature (works only with PostgreSQL).

Pro 🆕 Completed embedded document can now be authenticated using JWT with expiration (data-token).

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.5
entry.content: 🛠 Allow to select shared link form fields (name, email or phone) 🐞 Fix SQLite queries

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.6
entry.content: 🆕 Add text field length validation 🆕 Add webhook events log

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.7
entry.content: 🆕 Request Email 2FA via shared links 🛠 Adjust font size scaling on small screens 🛠 Remove Github and Upgrade buttons from the dashboard 🛠 Make it not possible to upload a PDF in the image field
